title: Quick tagliatelle carbonara
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) fresh or dried tagliatelle', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '6 rashers back bacon, sliced thinly', '4 large egg yolks', '4 tablespoons single cream', '2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'ground black pepper, to taste', 'chopped fresh basil, to taste']
